author: djrtwo
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.1.0-beta.5` -- KIC 9832227 -- released!
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.1.0-beta.5

These specs will serve as initial interop targets for Merge devnets at the start of October.
Interop devnet meta-spec to follow shortly ğŸº
